attributes.action: Pay back ALL expenses ever claimed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The prime minister is hereby requested by the voters of this country to immediately and without condition pay back to the public purse all expenses ever claimed since becoming an MP and to pass legislation ensuring all MP's do the same.
Nothing less will restore trust in Parliament, you owe the people of this country.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
